body.name: Marvel Titan Hero Series Spider-Man 12-Inch Action Figure with Fx Port, Perfect for Easter Toys, Basket Stuffers, and Gifts for Kids
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 32 mins
features: 12-Inch scale Spider-Man figure – Imagine Peter Parker suiting up as the friendly, neighborhood Spider-Man with this 12-inch-scale Spider-Man figure, inspired by the classic character design from the Marvel Comics.

Talking Super hero action figure – connect projectile launcher (not included. Sold separately with Titan hero blast figures.) to port on Spider-Man action figure’s back to activate sounds & phrases inspired by the Spider-Man Movie and fire projectiles!
Spider-Man movie-inspired design – fans can imagine the web-slinging and wall-crawling Spidey adventures with this Spider-Man figure, inspired by the character from the Marvel comic books.

Compatible with titan hero blast gear launcher (not included. Sold separately with Titan hero blast figures.) – connect to Titan hero series and Titan hero blast gear figures (each sold separately) for sound effects.

Look for other Spidey Super hero toys - be on the lookout for other Spider-Man figures and gear to imagine the web-slinger swinging into action! Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.
body.description: Imagine swinging into the newest Spider-Man Adventure with Spider-Man figures, vehicles, and role-play items inspired by the Marvel Comics. With this classic inspired line of toys, kids can imagine the web-slinging, wall-crawling action as Spider-Man faces new challenges and new villains. Products each sold separately. Subject to availability.imagine the web-slinging hero swinging through the city with this Spider-Man figure from the Titan hero series! When kids connect the Titan hero blast gear launcher (not included; sold separately with Titan hero blast gear figures) to this figure's arm port, they can activate sound effects and launch projectiles!titan hero blast gear launcher sold with Titan hero blast gear figures. Each sold separately. Subject to availability.copyright 2019 Marvel. Copyright 2019 cpii.

productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 9,607 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have found the Spider-Man Marvel Titan Hero Series Spider-Man 12' Action Figure to be a great addition to any collection. The figure features a red and blue color scheme, which is iconic to Spider-Man's design.One of the standout features of this action figure is the FX port. With this port, you can attach various accessories or effects to enhance the play experience. It adds an extra layer of creativity and allows for dynamic and exciting poses.The size of the figure is also worth mentioning. Standing at 12 inches tall, it has an impressive presence and feels substantial in hand. The articulation points are well-designed, allowing for a good range of motion and the ability to strike different poses. This makes it fun to play with and display.The attention to detail in the sculpt and paint job is commendable. The costume design is faithful to the character's appearance in the Marvel comics and movies. The colors are vibrant, and the paint application is clean, giving the figure a high-quality look.In terms of durability, this action figure seems to be well-made. I haven't experienced any issues with loose joints or parts falling off. It feels sturdy and able to withstand regular play.Overall, the Spider-Man Marvel Titan Hero Series Spider-Man 12' Action Figure captures the essence of the character, offers an FX port for added playability, and has a solid build quality. Whether you are a fan of Spider-Man or simply enjoy collecting action figures, this one is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and beloved toy
reviews.reviewText: Kid wanted a Spider-Man for his birthday, so I took to Amazon to find an affordable option. This one fit the bill! It is a good size, looks like Spider-Man from the cartoons, and so far has held up to my son’s three year old antics. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very durable gift!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very durable toy, with that being said if you have a kid that likes to throw or swing Spiderman around... look out! Great for gifting! Great posable action figure for all ages!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift for kids
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for a friend's 3 year old. He takes it with him wherever he goes and LOVES it! So this is a big bang for the buck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Item is okay, but the box itself was damaged and taped up to look “fixed.” Disappointed considering it was supposed to be a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still In new condition
reviews.reviewText: This was the best gift for our two year old son, He loves spiderman and it is extremely durable and has been through a lot and has no issues at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just as described, Christmas present for my nephew. He loves large sized action figures. 12 in and durable, it has also been slept on and so far hasn't broken yet.

reviews.reviewText: Bellissimo personaggio...fatto veramente bene...colori identici alla foto...il mio nipotino ne è entusiasta 👍
